items.name: Yaren Junior Soccer Pitch
items.short_description: A vibrant mini-pitch perfect for young football enthusiasts to practice their skills and play friendly matches. Features small goals and soft turf.
items.address: Near Yaren Primary School, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Lagoon Hoops Court
items.short_description: A brightly colored mini-basketball court designed for kids, offering adjustable hoops for various ages. Ideal for practicing layups and shooting hoops.
items.address: Adjacent to Public Oval, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Sandy Net Zone
items.short_description: A mini volleyball court with soft sand, perfect for children to learn and enjoy beach volleyball. Equipment provided on request.
items.address: Near Anibare Bay, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Mini Sprint Track
items.short_description: A small, safe running track for kids to race, practice sprints, and engage in fun athletic challenges. Complete with starting blocks and finish lines.
items.address: Behind Nauru Sports Complex, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Reef Runner Splash Pad
items.short_description: A vibrant splash pad featuring interactive water jets, gentle fountains, and a shallow area for toddlers to safely cool off and play. Designed with colorful coral reef themes.
items.address: Yaren Central Park, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Coconut Cove Water Slides
items.short_description: A set of two small, twisting water slides that land in a shallow, supervised pool, perfect for younger children seeking a gentle thrill. Lifeguards are always on duty.
items.address: Near Aiwo District Border, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Mini Tide Pool Adventure
items.short_description: A controlled, shallow water area designed to mimic natural tide pools, where children can splash and explore without ocean currents. Features gentle waves and marine-themed toys.
items.address: Yaren Beachfront Recreation Area, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Tropical Bubbler Bay
items.short_description: A zero-depth entry water play area with soft geysers, squirting animal figures, and gentle rain showers for the youngest visitors. Shaded areas are available for parents.
items.address: Central Community Green, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Whispering Coconut Grove
items.short_description: A serene park area with walking paths, featuring carved wooden characters from Nauruan folklore and whimsical, oversized natural elements. Perfect for imaginative play and gentle exploration.
items.address: Adjacent to State House Gardens, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Island Spirit Trail
items.short_description: A themed trail showcasing scenes and characters from local legends and myths, with interactive storyboards and gentle challenges. Children can discover the 'spirits' of Nauru.
items.address: Behind Parliament House, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Coral Fairy Village
items.short_description: A miniature village constructed with natural materials, designed for children to imagine tiny 'coral fairies' and other island sprites living there. Includes small bridges and hidden nooks.
items.address: Near Boat Harbour, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Star Navigator's Playground
items.short_description: A small, open-air structure resembling a whimsical castle, inspired by ancient Nauruan navigation and star lore. Kids can climb, slide, and pretend to be island explorers.
items.address: Yaren Community Field, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Coconut Carousel Spin
items.short_description: A charming mini-carousel featuring tropical animal figures and island-themed seats, perfect for young children to enjoy a gentle, rotating ride. Music plays as it spins.
items.address: Central Market Area, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Island Express Mini Train
items.short_description: A small trackless train that takes children on a short, scenic loop around a designated park area, offering views of the surrounding greenery. All aboard for fun!
items.address: Yaren Botanical Garden, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Lagoon Bumper Boats
items.short_description: Kids can pilot their own small, motorized bumper boats in a shallow, supervised pool. It's a fun and safe way to splash and bump with friends.
items.address: Next to Public Library, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Nauru Jumper Palace
items.short_description: A large, inflatable bounce house shaped like a tropical island, providing endless jumping and tumbling fun for children of all ages. Safety attendant always present.
items.address: Yaren Civic Centre Grounds, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Coral Kingdom Playground
items.short_description: A multi-level playground featuring climbing nets, slides, swings, and ocean-themed structures like a 'whale' tunnel and 'coral reef' climbing walls. Soft safety surfacing.
items.address: Yaren Central Park, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Coconut Climber Adventure
items.short_description: An adventure playground with a central, accessible treehouse connected by rope bridges, slides, and climbing obstacles. Encourages exploration and physical activity.
items.address: Near Ewa District Border, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Sandy Shores Dig Site
items.short_description: A large sand play area equipped with diggers, shovels, buckets, and interactive water features for building and creative exploration. Shaded for comfort.
items.address: Yaren Beach Park, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Pacific Warrior Course
items.short_description: A mini obstacle course designed for kids, featuring low ropes, balance beams, climbing walls, and small tunnels to test agility and coordination in a safe environment.
items.address: Beside Nauru Secondary School, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Coral Buddy Meet & Greet
items.short_description: Meet and take photos with 'Coral Buddy,' Yaren's friendly ocean-themed mascot, who loves to share stories about Nauru's marine life. Check schedule for appearance times.
items.address: Yaren Tourist Information Center, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Island Storybook Characters
items.short_description: An interactive session where children can meet costumed characters from popular children's storybooks adapted with island themes. Opportunities for hugs and high-fives.
items.address: Yaren Community Hall, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Tropical Animal Pals Parade
items.short_description: A mini-parade and meet & greet with friendly, oversized tropical animal characters. Kids can dance along and get individual photos with their favorite pals.
items.address: Yaren Central Park Stage, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Ocean Guardians Interactive
items.short_description: Meet characters dressed as 'Ocean Guardians,' who teach kids about marine conservation through fun activities and photo opportunities. Educational and entertaining.
items.address: Nauru Environmental Centre, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Ancient Nauru Story Circle
items.short_description: A peaceful outdoor circle with comfortable seating and carved wooden figures, where traditional Nauruan legends are told by local elders or through audio recordings.
items.address: Yaren Heritage Park, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Coconut Leaf Story Garden
items.short_description: A charming garden setting where children can listen to prerecorded stories about island life and nature, activated by pressing interactive 'coconut' buttons. Shaded and inviting.
items.address: Next to Yaren Public Library, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Starlight Dream Weaver Corner
items.short_description: An open-air pavilion where evening storytelling sessions focus on Nauruan myths related to stars and the night sky. Blankets and cushions are provided for comfort.
items.address: Yaren Night Market Grounds, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Islander Puppet Story Nook
items.short_description: A small, cozy nook with a mini-stage for puppet shows featuring local folk tales and animal fables. Children can also try their hand at puppetry after the show.
items.address: Yaren Cultural Centre, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Island Petting Farm
items.short_description: A small, friendly petting farm featuring goats, chickens, rabbits, and other domestic animals. Children can interact safely under supervision and learn about farm life.
items.address: Near Anabar District Border, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Nauru Avian Haven
items.short_description: A small, open-air aviary showcasing common local and migratory bird species found on Nauru. Educational displays explain their habits and importance to the ecosystem.
items.address: Adjacent to Yaren Lake, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Reef Explorer Touch Pool
items.short_description: A supervised touch pool where children can gently interact with starfish, sea cucumbers, and other harmless marine creatures, learning about the local reef ecosystem.
items.address: Nauru Maritime Museum, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Tiny Wonders Insectarium
items.short_description: A small indoor exhibit dedicated to the fascinating world of Nauruan insects and spiders. Features magnifying stations and safe observation tanks.
items.address: Yaren Science Centre, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Lost Phosphate Treasure Hunt
items.short_description: A fun, island-themed treasure hunt where kids follow clues related to Nauru's history and nature to find a hidden 'treasure chest'. Suitable for small groups.
items.address: Around Phosphate House, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Bird Spotter's Nature Quest
items.short_description: An interactive quest along a designated nature trail, where children use a provided guide to spot specific birds, plants, and insects. Binoculars available for rent.
items.address: Yaren Eco-Trail, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Coral Reef Escape Room (Kids)
items.short_description: A mini escape room experience designed specifically for children, with puzzles and challenges related to protecting the coral reef. Teamwork is essential to 'escape'!
items.address: Yaren Family Entertainment Hub, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Pacific Explorer's Map Challenge
items.short_description: Children receive a map and a series of navigational challenges to complete around a designated park area, learning basic map-reading skills and local landmarks.
items.address: Yaren Central Gardens, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Coconut Kids Circus Show
items.short_description: A charming, small-scale circus featuring local talent with juggling, clown acts, and simple acrobatics, designed for a family-friendly audience. Performances scheduled weekly.
items.address: Yaren Community Sports Hall, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Reef Rescuers Puppet Theater
items.short_description: A local puppet theater showcasing engaging stories about marine conservation and island culture using handcrafted puppets. Interactive Q&A sessions follow each show.
items.address: Yaren Cultural Centre, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Island Illusionist's Magic Matinee
items.short_description: A captivating magic show for children, featuring simple tricks, audience participation, and lots of laughter. Expect disappearing coconuts and floating fish!
items.address: Yaren Youth Centre, Yaren District, Nauru

items.name: Nauruan Shadow Puppet Tales
items.short_description: An enchanting shadow puppet theater performance, bringing ancient Nauruan legends to life with intricate silhouettes and traditional music. Unique cultural experience.
items.address: Nauru Museum & Culture Center, Yaren District, Nauru
